entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:59 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -37.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -37.8°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -41.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
